overview: In a place where sex is bad and punishable time when lust runs rampant and the men show it in their eyes. The Sex Police are on their trail, but The Sex Radicals are coming out on top! When the Sex Police return for a second time, the Radicals will be ready... Ready for hot, man fed action. Only to triumph over the bad. They will take what is theirs. Victory for sex.
title: Secret Sex 2: The Sex Radicals
